title: Project Babbage: Ada Makes Movies
description: Film production is ripe for digital disruption.  Opportunity to make the lives of creators and investors easier through smart contracts.
solution: A dapp ecosystem for movie production:  a production company in a crypto box.  Predictable for investors and safe for creators.
experience: Traveled By / Analytical Engine Productions includes 16 years of product management and 10 years of independent film production experience.
